tool_description: Feeling down? Uplifted? Stuck? Find the perfect quote for every mood with the Mood Based Quote API. AI-powered precision matches words to your emotions, giving you solace, joy, or a fresh perspective. Unlock a world of wisdom and elevate your apps and platforms with the power of quotes.
name: Mood Based Quote API
title: Mood Based Quote API

api_list.name: Get quote by mood
api_list.description: Specify your mood and get various quotes with their author names making your mood easily expressible by words.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mood-based-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com/happiness"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mood-based-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mood-based-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com/{mood}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mood-based-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
